text: Magnificent Obsession is a 1935 American drama movie directed by John M. Stahl and based on the 1929 novel of the same name by Lloyd C. Douglas. It stars Robert Taylor, Irene Dunne, Charles Butterworth, Betty Furness, Sara Haden, Beryl Mercer and was distributed by Universal Pictures. It was remade in 1954. ==Other websites== * * Category:1935 drama movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by John M. Stahl
title: Magnificent Obsession (1935 movie)
